entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
